overview:
Holly is an experienced Product Management and Product Marketing executive. She is the Head of Product and Marketing at mySkin.com, a personalized recommendation and social commerce startup in skincare. Joined in the very early days of the startup, she built the product team and marketing team from the ground up, and led the site from private alpha to public launch and redesign. She oversees both the mobile and web products, user experience, and product marketing.

Her areas of expertise include product management, product marketing, mobile apps, social commerce, ecommerce, social discovery, recommendation engines, product launch, user experience, user acquisition and retention, disruptive innovation, and growth strategy.

Before mySkin, Holly was a Strategy and Operations Consultant at Deloitte Consulting, using Disruptive Innovation approach to advise Fortune 500 companies on innovation, disruptive technology, product launch, operations improvement, corporate strategy, and marketing strategy. She also worked at A.T. Kearney, the United Nations, and U.S. Chamber of Commerce.

relationships.title: Head of Product Management and Marketing
